text: It's off - -'' canceled,'' if you will. After two seasons and 20 episodes, the E! network on Tuesday announced they will not renew The Arrangement, one of its two scripted series, for a third season. The fictional celebrity drama, which certainly never mined the Church of Scientology and the marriage of Tom Cruise and Katie Holmes for source material, aired what turned out to be its series finale on May 13. That episode, titled ` ` Suite Revenge,'' was - - at least for a short time - - regarded as the Season 2 finale. It was seen by 432, 000 viewers and drew a 1. 8 rating in the 18 - 49 demo. ` ` Over two seasons, E!'s scripted series The Arrangement has taken viewers inside the world of an
